name: Christian Nørgaard Storm Pedersen
content: Christian NÃ¸rgaard Storm Pedersen Christian NÃ¸rgaard Storm Pedersen About I am the head of the Bioinformatics Research Center (BiRC). My background is in Computer Science, and used to be affiliated to the Department of Computer Science, but is now, as BiRC, part of the Department of Molecular Biology and Genetics at the Faculty of Natural Sciences, Aarhus University. My office is at the Bioinformatics Research Center on the 3rd floor in building 1872. I am part of the teaching committee for the Master's degree program in bioinformatics at Aarhus University. Take a look at this page, or the study portal for bioinformatics for more information. My main research interests are algorithmic aspects of bioinformatics and machine learning. I also teach classes and supervise students in these topics. Take a look at: List of publications. List of classes that I have taught. List of students that I have supervised. Contact Bioinformatics Research Center Universitetsbyen 81, Building 1872 Aarhus University DK-8000 Aarhus C, Denmark Office: 1872.349 E-mail: cstorm[at]birc.au.dk Phone: +45 2778 2810 This page is maintained by Christian NÃ¸rgaard Storm Pedersen.
